introduction.title: Hi, I am Roberto Tibes
introduction.content: A Web focused developer looking forward to an opportunity on a software development career

about.title: About Me
about.resume: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills mostly in terms of programming and technology
about.content1: and I'm a Frontend Web Developer located in Porto União, SC-BR. I’ve been studying Information Systems College for 3 years now, and I’m looking forward to an opportunity to work on the software development area.
about.content2: I'm a bit of a digital product junky. Over the years, I've used most of the most popular web and mobile frameworks. Feel free to contact me here.
